Secure Growth, Simplify Complexity

Maxio allows you to streamline billing for complex contracts, automate revenue recognition, and gain actionable insights into SaaS metrics, all with a platform designed for enterprise-grade growth.

Get started

Trusted by thousands of B2B SaaS companies

How Billing Complexity Slows Cybersecurity Companies Down

Scaling in the cybersecurity industry brings unique billing and financial challenges. Managing enterprise-grade contracts, tracking SaaS metrics, and adopting new pricing models can quickly become overwhelming with the wrong billing system, leading to inefficiencies, strained resources, and slow growth.

Large, Negotiated Contracts Create Billing Complexity

Enterprise deals with custom pricing, multi-year ramp agreements, and CPI increases require intricate invoicing, which manual processes and non-SaaS optimized systems can’t efficiently handle.

SaaS Metrics Are Cumbersome to Manage

Tracking metrics like GRR, NRR, CLV, and ARR is difficult with unique contract structures, leaving CFOs and CEOs without the insights they need for decisions.

Deferred Revenue Complicates Financial Reporting

Managing deferred revenue is complex without automation, and relying on spreadsheets can lead to inaccuracies and compliance challenges.

Scaling GTM Models Adds Complexity

Transitioning from sales-led to product-led growth (or vice versa) adds billing challenges, requiring adaptable solutions for hybrid GTM strategies.

Usage-Based Pricing Overburdens Developer Teams

Pricing models that rely on tracking usage like API calls, seats, or nodes drain developer resources without automation in place, shifting focus away from innovation.

Security and Compliance Challenges

Meeting SOC 1, SOC 2, and PCI compliance is essential but difficult without secure, audit-ready billing systems.

Solving Cybersecurity Billing Challenges with Maxio

Maxio isn’t just another billing and financial platform—it’s purpose-built to empower SaaS companies to scale, adapt, and thrive. By offering unmatched flexibility, scalability, and ease of use, Maxio equips you to manage the complexities of enterprise-grade contracts, usage-based pricing, and SaaS metrics with confidence.

With Maxio, you can streamline operations, automate revenue recognition, and gain actionable insights that unlock your company’s growth potential.

Get a demo

Built for the Unique Needs of Cybersecurity Companies

Maxio is designed to address the challenges cybersecurity companies face, offering tools and features that align with your industry’s unique demands.

  • Usage-Based Billing: Support for usage-based GTM models based on API calls, nodes, or seats ensures you can monetize your services effectively without overburdening your developers.
  • Self-Service Sign-Up Pages: Empower product-led growth GTM models with intuitive self-service options while maintaining enterprise-grade billing workflows.
  • Tailored for Enterprise Deals: Handle complex contracts, ramp agreements, and CPI adjustments with ease, ensuring your billing system grows with your business.
  • Actionable Insights: Real-time reporting on GRR, NRR, CLV, and ARR gives you the data they need to make informed decisions.
  • Scalable for Hybrid GTM Models: Whether you’re sales-led, product-led, or both, Maxio adapts to your go-to-market strategy without compromising efficiency.

Complex Pricing Without Bottlenecks

Automatically collect subscription and usage data, calculate line items, and send accurate invoices. Say goodbye to manual calculations and collection processes.

Choose from over 25 billing models to fit your business needs, from simple subscriptions or complex usage-based billing.

Maxio enables you to create tailored billing plans and adapt pricing strategies quickly, allowing you to meet specific customer requirements and respond to market demands.

Integrate with over 20 payment gateways to offer your clients various payment options.

Maxio ensures safe and secure transactions across all platforms, providing seamless integration with your preferred payment providers for a smooth billing experience.

Maxio supports billing in over 150 currencies, allowing you to expand your reach to international markets.

With automatic currency conversion, you can ensure accurate billing using real-time rates, while also meeting local currency regulations and standards effortlessly.

Scalable Revenue Recognition

Automate your revenue recognition to ensure compliance with ASC 606 and IFRS 15, reduce risks from manual processes, and pass audits with ease.

Maxio’s revenue recognition workflows ensure compliance with ASC 606 and IFRS 15 standards.

By connecting all customer, contract, invoice, revenue, and payment details, Maxio keeps your records error-free, streamlines your financial reporting, and ensures compliance.

Run precise financial reports by eliminating data discrepancies with a single source of financial truth.

This accuracy supports your audit processes, ensuring you can pass audits with confidence and ease while providing transparency into your financial operations.

Maxio handles new, expansion, and contraction revenue streams efficiently, allowing your business to scale without added complexity.

By analyzing all customer and billing information and running calculations with up-to-date records, Maxio ensures your revenue recognition processes remain robust and effective as you grow.

Insights You Can’t Get Anywhere Else

Bring in your existing data and customize dashboards for each user or role. Create drillable reports referencing data from your favorite CRM and accounting software, with no custom field limits.

Maxio seamlessly integrates with your preferred CRM and accounting software, consolidating all relevant data into a single platform.

This integration eliminates the need for manual data transfers, ensuring you always have access to up-to-date and accurate information.

With Maxio, there are no limits on custom fields, allowing you to capture and analyze all the specific data points relevant to your business such as asking “how did you hear about us?” or “what is your favorite feature?” (and anything else you want to know).

This flexibility ensures that your reports are as detailed and comprehensive as needed, giving you full control over your financial insights.

Generate detailed, drillable reports that provide deep insights into your financial data.

Maxio enables you to segment and analyze your data by various dimensions, such as customer, invoice, or revenue streams, allowing you to uncover trends and make informed decisions quickly.
